game.name: Train Simulator: BR Class 76 & 77 Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Class 77 and 76 Add-On puts some high-voltage haulage on the Woodhead Line! Created as an add-on for the Woodhead Line Expansion Pack
